pageContext.claim: “Mike had a call today with 53 governors, and I heard it was a very good call, and everybody is very well coordinated. And the governors and the states -- all of them; I can't think of an exception -- they've been really working closely with us.”
pageContext.analysis: State and local officials of both parties have publicly complained about the federal response because they were unable to secure tests or necessary personal protective equipment for medical professionals.
